Navigation
Name Rascal/Libraries/analysis/statistics/SimpleRegression/totalSumSquares
Synopsis Sum of squared deviations.
Function num totalSumSquares(list[tuple[num,num]] values) throws IllegalArgument(value v, str message)
Usage import analysis::statistics::SimpleRegression;
Description Returns the sum of squared deviations of the y values about their mean. This is defined as SSTO.
